title: Boxplot: Effect on the Range and IQR by an Outlier
question_text:
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.
Looking at the modified boxplot above, what will happen to the range and IQR(interquartile range) when the outlier of $23$ is removed?

choices.text: The range and IQR will decrease.
The range will decrease, but the IQR will increase.
The range will decrease, but the IQR will remain about the same.
The range and IQR will both increase.
The range will increase and the IQR will decrease.
